TopicTitle: Is .20 unplayable for anyone else because of crashes?

Articles.Content:
I just can't even play the game, it crashes constantly, when I go to launch, when I'm in the VAB, when I'm ending a flight.. I have the Nova Pack, KW pack and Mechjeb, which haven't been updated so they may be the cause of it, but I really don't like the stock parts. Big ugly orange tanks.. I was just wondering if anyone else has as many crashes as I do?

This was the latest crash: http://file2web.com/4862013-05-22_225008.zip
Don't blame the game until you've tried a fresh install; it's almost certainly a mod issue.

Don't blame the game until you've tried a fresh install; it's almost certainly a mod issue.
I have the Nova Pack, KW pack and Mechjeb, which haven't been updated so they may be the cause of it

I never blamed the game. I simply asked a question, uploaded the crash file, and asked if others who may be running stock were experiencing frequent crashes. A fresh install would take a while to download on a connection as slow as mine. (less than 1Mb/s) Besides, I realize that there are going to be bugs in the first release. They'll launch a patch soon with a ton of fixes, but like I said I was just wanting to know.
I've had performance issues with the last two updates until I installed it fresh, and then re-installed my mods, and from that point on all was smooth and good
